items.name: Wine bottle
items.description: Will getting drunk help me escape faster?

items.name: Bowling ball
items.description: I know I'm on a time limit here, but I wonder if I can get a strike.

items.name: Bowling pins
items.description: There are 6 lilac bowling pins. I should spend some time winning a game.

items.name: Painting
items.description: This is a beautiful painting with shades of purple covering the canvas.

items.name: Safe
items.description: There is a purple safe with a keypad to enter 4 numbers

items.name: Key from safe
items.description: A key with a cloud on it.

items.name: Candle
items.description: This candle looks like it won't last much longer.

items.name: Kitchen knife
items.description: This kitchen knife looks oddly thin.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: A cup of coffee, oddly, it's still warm.

items.name: Fridge
items.description: Taking a snack break might help me speed up my progress.

items.name: Rotten milk
items.description: A cup of milk sits on one of the fridge shelves. The smell makes you gag, but you see something shiny through the rotten chunks.

items.name: Cheese
items.description: A block of cheese sits by the milk. Who do you think this cheese is meant for?

items.name: Mouse
items.description: A small brown mouse is sitting scurrying around the room. It seems to be holding something in its teeth.

items.name: Note from Mouse
items.description: A note given to you by the Mouse, it reads [don't forget your abc's].

items.name: Toilet paper rolls
items.description: 5 periwinkle toilet paper rolls are stacked in a pyramid

items.name: Couch
items.description: A big brown couch with 3 cushions, one of the cushions seems to have some stitches on it

items.name: Couch cushion
items.description: The cushion of a couch, a couple stiches hold the fabric together.

items.name: Key from couch cushion
items.description: Another key with an engraving of a flower on it, does it open more doors?

items.name: Fireplace
items.description: The fireplace is lit and doesn't seem like dying out anytime soon.

items.name: Left shoe
items.description: A worn out left shoe.

items.name: Note from left shoe
items.description: A note that says [Find the pair]

items.name: Right shoe
items.description: A worn out right shoe, it seems to match the left one

items.name: Peculiar coin
items.description: A small gold coin is found in the right shoe, do I have to start collecting money now?

items.name: Desk
items.description: A big oak desk with a piggy bank on the top left corner of it. There is also 4 drawers on the other side of the desk, there could be something useful in there.

items.name: Piggy bank
items.description: A pink piggy bank with a slot to drop coins in, now I have a spot to place my coin.

items.name: Main floor map
items.description: A map of floor 0, this will be useful

items.name: Upstairs right map
items.description: East half of the floor1 map

items.name: Book
items.description: A book on the desk with the title [How to pick locks with knifes for dummies].

items.name: Upstairs left map
items.description: West half of the floor1 map

items.name: Floor board
items.description: A thinner piece of floorboard which looks out of place.

items.name: Key from attic
items.description: A shiny key that has a design of an ornate door on it.

items.name: Patio table note
items.description: A note on the patio table that reads [mow the lawn].

items.name: Shovel
items.description: A rusty shovel.

items.name: Hole
items.description: There seems to be something at the bottom of this hole.

items.name: Key from hole
items.description: A key with the symbol of the gate on it
